backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profile storage with access control checks for viewing and saving profiles.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to source files, components, and test IDs for build and verification.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend components, hooks, and config files.
frontend/.ic-assets.json: IC asset configuration defining cache rules and headers for frontend static files including website-code.zip.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md: Deployment checklist outlining required build steps, asset verification, config validation, and production testing.
frontend/DOMAIN_SETUP.md: Guide explaining DNS, SSL, and redirect configuration for setting up the sangharshclasses.in custom domain.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining design tokens, dark mode variables, and base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Source HTML entry file containing SEO metadata, schema.org JSON-LD, canonical links, favicons, and Vite dev script.
frontend/public/_headers: Sets MIME types and download headers for key static assets.
frontend/public/_redirects: Defines Netlify-style redirects ensuring static files resolve and all other routes fallback to index.html.
frontend/public/404.html: SPA fallback page that redirects non-static paths to the root while preserving the original URL.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Allows all crawlers and points to the sitemap XML.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Sitemap containing the homepage URL with metadata.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component initializing diagnostics and SEO guards and rendering HomePage within an error boundary.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: Renders the About section using marketing content with paragraphs and a feature card.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that logs errors and displays a fallback UI.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Contact section with phone, WhatsApp, email interactions and styled cards.
frontend/src/components/Courses.tsx: Displays courses grid and extra info using marketing content with styled cards and features.
frontend/src/components/DownloadWebsiteC: Button that triggers download of a static ZIP file.
frontend/src/components/Faculty.tsx: Renders faculty cards with photos, roles, experience, and specialization.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with site info, quick links, contact details, and social icons.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with scroll effects, navigation links, logo, and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section with background image, headings, CTAs, and animated stats.
frontend/src/components/RuntimeErrorFall: Fallback component showing an error message with reload and homepage buttons.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppButton.t: Floating WhatsApp CTA button that opens a chat using the configured phone number.
frontend/src/content/marketingSiteConten: Centralized marketing content including site metadata, hero text, about info, faculty, and course details.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendActorSafe.t: Safe actor hook that initializes backend actor with optional admin token and handles errors non‑fatally.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, logout, and identity management via React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Query hooks for loading and saving the caller’s user profile via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme CSS variables for light/dark mode, animations, typography defaults, and custom scrollbar styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, importing global styles.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage layout by composing header, main content sections, footer, and a WhatsApp button.
frontend/src/static-export/renderStaticS: Generates a full static HTML page using marketing content, including escaped text and structured sections.
frontend/src/static-export/staticExportA: Lists image assets and their destination paths for inclusion in static site exports.
frontend/src/static-export/zipWriter.ts: Implements an in-memory ZIP writer placeholder that tracks added files for static export builds.
Empty placeholder file for future content serialization utilities.
frontend/src/utils/runtimeDiagnostics.ts: Provides runtime logging for errors, promise rejections, and component render starts when diagnostics are enabled.
frontend/src/utils/seoGuards.ts: Implements SEO guards enforcing canonical URLs and noindex rules depending on domain environment.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom color variables, container settings, plugins, and animation/keyframe extensions.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite config enabling React, env injection, dev proxy, and a custom plugin that generates a static-site export, copies assets, and zips the output after build.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the app’s architecture, features, and versioned frontend/backend capabilities for a React + Vite site with an ICP backend.
